tool_description: Database with all the continents, countries, states and cities of the world. This directory contains all 7 continents, 250 countries, 4,882 subdivisions (provinces, states, etc) and more than 147,418 thousand cities.
title: Countries States Cities Dataset

api_list.name: All Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://countries-states-cities-dataset.p.rapidapi.com/list-countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "countries-states-cities-dataset.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
